alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 8:02AM CST until January 30 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro F Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 915 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Vermilion River at Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Minor flooding of Beaver Park and Vermilionville near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday afternoon and continue falling to 9.9 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Vermilion River Lafayette, Surrey Street Gag 10.0 MSG unknown 10.5 10.3 10. 2 &&
